alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:48AM CDT until April 14 at 1:55PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Carlyle. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kaskaskia River at Carlyle. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Kaskaskia River Carlyle 16.5 17.4 16.7 15.4 14.4 13.3 12.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
